X.i.6.E.3.f
.
Acceptable Alternative Means of Document Transfer
IDES referral packages and IDES examination results will primarily be transmitted between MSCs and PEBLOs via automated processes.Â  However, if those processes fail, or further documentation must be transferred, the following methods are acceptable:
encrypted e-mail
Department of Defense Safe Access File Exchange (DoD SAFE) transfer, or
shared local drives.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section E - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES), Referrals, and Initial Processing
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section E
